page.title: 02HOME LIFE
page.content: There is one very big lake on Colonel Stantons estate with two swans and five cygnets. At one time there were two hundred Trout but most of these have now been fished. At one end of the lake is a boat house the boats were kept underneath. And above is a room where the ladys had tea and watched the gentlemen boating and shooting. There are also two smaller lakes which Colonel Stanton has made recently. Round the house are gardens where many flowers are growing,Some of these are quite rare.At this time of the year (June) there are banks of azaleas and rhododendrons. Another featur is a wood full of Monkey Puzzle trees.
